sources.title: Noah's Ark (2007) Adventure, Comedy, Fantasy, Musical | Full Animated Movie
sources.description:
Noah is building a whale of a boat in order to save two of every species from a flood that will cover the entire world. Pretty soon, animals are lining up to board the Ark two by two.

Original title: El arca

Director: Juan Pablo Buscarini
Writers: Axel Nacher, Fernando Schmidt, Enrique Cortés
Stars: Juan Carlos Mesa, Jorge Guinzburg, Mariana Fabbiani
Genres: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Fantasy, Musical

@CultCinemaClassics
